function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High HIV prevalence in specific provinces","Impact":"Increased risk of HIV transmission and spread within these provinces","Mitigation":"Implement targeted prevention and control measures in high-prevalence provinces","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping, community-based interventions","People":"Population in high-prevalence provinces, especially women and men","Owner":"Health departments, local government, community organizations"},{"Description":"Age and marital status as predictors of HIV infection","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of specific age and marital groups to HIV infection","Mitigation":"Targeted education and awareness programs for vulnerable age and marital groups","Technologies":"Health education campaigns, community outreach programs","People":"Women aged 35-49, married women, men aged 35, individuals living in communities with high poverty rates","Owner":"Health organizations, NGOs, community leaders"},{"Description":"Spatial clustering of HIV cases in specific provinces","Impact":"Heightened risk of localized HIV transmission and rapid spread within clustered areas","Mitigation":"Focused testing and prevention campaigns in clustered areas, improved access to healthcare services","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, mobile clinics, community health workers","People":"Population living in clustered areas with high HIV prevalence","Owner":"Health departments, local government, community health organizations"}]}
